ygData.subject: Re: Barnacle Breastplate quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard of a zombie skin quest from a member of my guild that raises faction with them.   I do not know where it starts or the details, try looking it up
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard of a zombie skin quest from a member of my guild that raises
faction with them. I do not know where it starts or the details, try
looking it up on the web. You can also kill the heritics somewhere in Tox.
It is a nice looking plate, too bad the dwarven ringmail tunic has better
stats =(


At 04:59 PM 1/28/00 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Corey de Danann" <corey@...>
>
>I hope this isn't too off topic. I was hoping to do this quest but can't
>get my faction high enough with the Deepwater Knights in Erudin to get the
>Guild master to give me the quest or any other quest for that matter. I
>used the Charismatic Carillon to get me up to indifferent but that is as
>High as I can go.
>
>I also looked to see if there were any other ways to raise my faction but
>could only find the Odus Pearl quest which raises faction with the Knights.
>Unfortunately, it is given by the same guy in the guild and needs a
>container he gives you to complete it. Again, he won't talk to me about any
>quests.
>
>Kitasi, you are the king of quests from what I hear, maybe you know what I
>can do. Or if, in fact it is a lost cause. Anyone who has any info can
>share, not just Kit.
>
>Thanks,
>
>
>Llyrean
>
